title: Holstein Housewares 4 Slice Countertop Toaster Oven with 60 Minute Timer Includes Pan and Wire Rack, Perfect for Baking, Broiling, and Toasting Compact Design in Sleek Black for Convenient Kitchen Use
description: With room for a 9” pizza or four slices of bread, Holstein Housewares 4-Slice Toaster Oven is a handy appliance for any kitchen! This compact toaster oven has multiple options: bake, broil, and toast up to 240°C with an adjustable temperature control. It features a 60-minute timer with auto shut-off function and also has a stay-on setting to keep the food warm.
